notes: Metrics requested by the sustainability / performance reporting brief. Each group is executed in its own agent run.

groups.name: Water Data
groups.description: Net water savings and consumption context for the property group.

metrics.label: Gallons Saved (Quarter-to-Date)
metrics.description: Net gallons of water saved in the current quarter.

metrics.label: Gallons Saved (Year-to-Date)
metrics.description: Net gallons of water saved since the start of the calendar year.

metrics.label: Gallons Saved (Inception-to-Date)
metrics.description: Net gallons of water saved since the project started.

metrics.label: Total Water Usage
metrics.description: Total gallons of water consumed during the reporting period.

metrics.label: Baseline Water Usage
metrics.description: Expected gallons of water usage without the Symmons system.

metrics.label: Normalized Water Use
metrics.description: Water consumption normalized per key / square foot / bed.

groups.name: Carbon Data
groups.description: Carbon emissions avoided as a result of water and energy savings.

metrics.label: Carbon Avoided (tCO2e)
metrics.description: Metric tons of CO2e avoided through water/energy savings.

metrics.label: Carbon Avoided (Calculated)
metrics.description: Carbon avoided computed as energy_saved × emissions_factor.

groups.name: Financial Data
groups.description: Financial impacts and ROI metrics for the property group.

metrics.label: Water Dollars Saved
metrics.description: Dollar savings from reduced water usage.

metrics.label: Energy Dollars Saved
metrics.description: Dollar savings generated from reduced energy/BTU consumption.

metrics.label: Downtime Dollars Avoided
metrics.description: Estimated costs avoided by preventing outages or downtime.

metrics.label: Total Financial Impact
metrics.description: Combined savings (water + energy + downtime).

metrics.label: Run-Rate Savings
metrics.description: Quarterly savings run rate compared to contracted fees.

metrics.label: Contracted Fees
metrics.description: Total contracted fees for the portfolio or property group.

metrics.label: Forecast Annual Savings
metrics.description: Projected savings for the next year.

metrics.label: ROI %
metrics.description: Return on investment percentage.

metrics.label: Cumulative ROI (USD)
metrics.description: Lifetime or cumulative ROI in dollars.

metrics.label: IRR %
metrics.description: Internal Rate of Return of the customer investment.

metrics.label: Payback Status
metrics.description: Qualitative payback status (achieved / in progress / pending).

metrics.label: Months to Payback
metrics.description: Months required to reach investment payback.

metrics.label: Water USD Saved
metrics.description: Water cost savings calculated as gallons_saved × water_rate.

metrics.label: Energy USD Saved
metrics.description: Energy cost savings calculated as btus_saved × energy_rate.

metrics.label: Downtime USD Avoided
metrics.description: Dollar value assigned to downtime or event prevention.

groups.name: Installation Data
groups.description: Portfolio installation progress, timing, and execution quality.

metrics.label: Total Sites
metrics.description: Total sites included in the customer portfolio.

metrics.label: Sites Installed
metrics.description: Number of sites fully installed.

metrics.label: Sites In Progress
metrics.description: Number of sites currently under installation.

metrics.label: Sites Not Started
metrics.description: Sites that are contracted but not yet started.

metrics.label: Median Ship-to-Install Days
metrics.description: Median number of days from shipment to installation.

metrics.label: On-Time Percentage
metrics.description: Percentage of installations completed on time.

groups.name: Device Data
groups.description: Device health, online status, and alert telemetry.

metrics.label: Device Online %
metrics.description: Percentage of devices currently online.

metrics.label: Device Health %
metrics.description: Percentage of devices that report healthy status.

metrics.label: Total Alerts
metrics.description: Total number of alerts triggered during the reporting period.

metrics.label: Alerts by Type
metrics.description: Breakdown of alerts by category or severity.

metrics.label: Unresolved Alerts
metrics.description: Count of alerts that remain open or unresolved.

metrics.label: Alert Acknowledgement %
metrics.description: Percentage of alerts acknowledged by users.

metrics.label: Incident Count
metrics.description: Number of incidents recorded within the reporting period.

metrics.label: Average Incident Severity
metrics.description: Average severity score of incidents.

metrics.label: MTTA (Hours)
metrics.description: Mean time to acknowledge alerts.

metrics.label: MTTR (Hours)
metrics.description: Mean time to resolve alerts.

groups.name: Risk Data
groups.description: Risks, decisions, and actions needed for portfolio success.

metrics.label: Expansion Risks
metrics.description: Constraints or risks such as site access or utilities.

metrics.label: Top Risks
metrics.description: Highest-priority risks affecting the portfolio.

metrics.label: Decisions Needed
metrics.description: Outstanding business or operational decisions.

metrics.label: Open Actions
metrics.description: Number of open follow-up actions.

metrics.label: Next Milestones
metrics.description: Upcoming deliverables or milestones.
